Howdy
The name's Josue pronounced ho-sway 

Video games are one of my favorite hobbies. I have been playing them for as long as I can remember. The longest running franchise I've played has to be pokemon, but Final Fantasy has become one of my favorite series 
I have had a few different types of pets over the years. A variety of fish that, until recently, I did not know I was overfeeding. I have had two slider turtles. I have also had two rabbits. The pet I currently have now is a beautiful, small husky that I have had for five years. Her name is Nova and she is 5 years old. she has one blue eye and one brown eye. 

Traveling the country is one of my goals. I would like to see more of our own country and eventually other countries. In 2021, I took my first trip as a part of that goal by going to Colorado for my birthday. That is the furthest west I have gone. I went skiing for my first time. I hopped around spending a night or two in each spot and doing what I could for the weather that I had.
